pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Resurrects the holder upon death and grants them temporary protection.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_of_amethyst)Totem of Amethyst$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 1$(br)$(l)Active/Passive:$() Passive, 1 use and burns out on use$(br)$(l)Tier:$() Extreme$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other passive totem augments.
